name: Ninja Run - Dash And Jump For Fruit - Watch Out For Deadly Insects!
name_original: Ninja Run - Dash And Jump For Fruit - Watch Out For Deadly Insects!
description:
Your Ninja loves fruit! Roam around in this fun endless runner game collecting yummy fruit powerups.

Beware! There are also deadly giant bugs running around who also love fruit!

***** Awesome 3D Ninja *****
***** Cool Creepy 3D Insects *****
***** Endless Runner Game *****

Install and Play Now!
